abstract: Regulators in Europe were ready to clear the deal after Oracle promised that MySQL would continue to be free.
snippet: Regulators in Europe were ready to clear the deal after Oracle promised that MySQL would continue to be free.
lead_paragraph: European regulators appeared ready on Monday to clear the way for Oracle’s $7.4 billion acquisition of Sun Microsystems after Oracle agreed to a series of concessions to allay antitrust concerns.

headline.main: Oracle Makes Concessions in Sun Microsystems Bid
headline.print_headline: Oracle Makes Concessions In Sun Microsystems Bid
